How do I start receiving ride requests?: How do I start receiving ride requests?
Set your status to 'Online' to begin rec: Set your status to 'Online' to begin receiving nearby ride requests from passengers.
How can I accept or reject a ride?: How can I accept or reject a ride?
Tap 'Accept' when a ride request appears: Tap 'Accept' when a ride request appears. Ignore it if you don't wish to accept.
What if the rider doesn’t show up?: What if the rider doesn’t show up?
Wait 5-10 minutes, then cancel with the: Wait 5-10 minutes, then cancel with the reason 'Rider No-show'.
When do I get paid for completed rides?: When do I get paid for completed rides?
Payments reflect instantly in your walle: Payments reflect instantly in your wallet after each completed ride.
How do I withdraw my wallet balance?: How do I withdraw my wallet balance?
Go to 'Wallet' > 'Withdraw', enter the a: Go to 'Wallet' > 'Withdraw', enter the amount, and confirm your bank account.
Which documents are required to drive?: Which documents are required to drive?
Driving license, RC, insurance, and iden: Driving license, RC, insurance, and identity proof are mandatory.
What if the app stops working?: What if the app stops working?
Restart your phone and check internet co: Restart your phone and check internet connection. Use 'Help' for support.
Can I cancel a ride after accepting?: Can I cancel a ride after accepting?
Yes, with a valid reason. But frequent c: Yes, with a valid reason. But frequent cancellations can affect your ratings.

We need your location even when the app:
We need your location even when the app isn't open to ensure accurate ride tracking.

Please select *Always Allow* when prompted. This helps your driver find you faster, ensures safety, and improves route accuracy.
To serve you better, we need:\n\n1. *Loc:
To serve you better, we need:

1. *Location Access* – for real-time tracking even in the background.
2. *Overlay Permission* – to show ride updates while you use other apps.

This helps your driver reach you quickly and keeps your trip seamless.
